name: Dodge
text: Damage you take is reduced by your LUCK until your next turn

name: Block
text: Physical Damage you take is reduced by half until your next turn

name: Mage Armor
text: Damage you take is reduced by 2 for your next 2 turns

name: Cleave
text: Deal W damage to each adjacent enemy.

name: Sabotage
text: The next time target enemy would take a major action they take it against themselves instead

name: Second Wind
text: Target ally shuffles their graveyard into their library. gains 5 hp. and draws a card

name: Magic Missile
text: Up to two target enemies take 5 magic damage

name: Taunt
text: Adjacent enemies can't use major actions next turn unless they target you

name: Assassinate
text: Deal 7 damage to target enemy. Damage that you take is increased by 1 until your next turn.

name: Purify
text: Kill target undead creature or draw a card.

name: Shifting Earth
text: Change the row of up to 2 targets. Those targets may not move during their next turn.

name: Duel
text: Deal W damage to an adjacent target. Until your next turn that target can't take actions unless they target you.

name: Poison
text: Target enemy takes 4 poison damage at the beginning of each of their turns. At the end of each of their turns make a 'poison' check. If you fail this effect ends.

name: Sunburst
text: Deal 3 holy damage to each enemy.

name: Blinding Spray
text: Up to 3 enemies attack as if their opponents are dodging until your next turn.

name: Surge
text: Regain 5 life. Until your next turn reduce damage dealt to you by 2.

name: Sunder
text: Reduce target's damage resistance by 5. It can't go lower than 0.

name: Mass Heal
text: Each ally regains 5 hp.

name: Fireball
text: Deal 5 fire damage to target enemy and each enemy adjacent to them.

name: Danci=yp/ng Blade
text: Deal 3 damage. then you may move

name: Siphon Life
text: Deal 3 Holy damage. then heal an Ally for the damage dealt

name: Chill Wind
text: Up to two targets can't take Minor actions during their next turn. Draw a Card.

name: Double Slash
text: Deal W damage to an adjacent target. then deal W damage to an adjacent target.

name: Feint
text: The next time target enemy attacks you before your next turn prevent up to 5 damage from that attack. then deal W to them.

name: Holy Aura
text: All damage target ally does is increased by 2 Holy for your next two turns

name: Kidney Punch
text: Deal W damage to an adjacent enemy. Draw a Card.

name: Sleep
text: Discard a card. Target enemy can't take actions for your next 2 turns
